alert.note: Alert for Pima; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 31 at 7:46PM MST until July 31 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MST FOR NORTH CENTRAL PIMA AND SOUTH CENTRAL PINAL COUNTIES... At 744 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Avra Valley, or 13 miles northwest of Marana, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 735PM MST, a 72 MPH wind gust was reported at Marana Airport. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Marana, Avra Valley, Picacho Peak State Park, Saguaro National Park West, Picture Rocks, Red Rock, Silver Bell and Dove Mountain. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
